title: Order Dualies
content:
The Order Dualies are dualies in Splatoon 3 that are exclusively used in Side Order.

- 1 Appearance

- 2 Description

- 3 Gallery

- 4 Names in other languages

The Order Dualies have a minimalist appearance, with a single white molded piece for the handle and body of the weapon, as well as a metallic silver ink tank and nozzle. Its appearance is similar to that of the Splat Dualies. When firing, ring-shaped holograms manifest around both Dualies.

The Order Dualies are the first weapon to be unlocked in  Side Order and are part of Pearl's Palette. Their base set consists of Curling Bombs and Reefslider. However, this can be changed in the Spire of Order by using a vending machine.

They have lower stats in comparison to the Splat Dualies, with lower fire rate, damage, strafe speed, ink efficiency, range, and only one dodge roll. However, this can be upgraded through color chips in the Spire of Order.
